data.title: Recognized Sororities and Fraternities
data.meta_site_name: Loyola University Chicago - Center for Student Engagement (CSE)
data.text:
Twenty (20) sororities and fraternities comprise the Sorority & Fraternity Life community at Loyola University Chicago. This includes five (5) men's fraternities, seven (7) women's sororities, and eight (8) culturally-based fraternities and sororities (including 4 National Pan-Hellenic Council or "Divine Nine" organizations). Membership is open to full-time, degree-seeking undergraduate students with a minimum of 12 credits and at least a 2.5 cumulative GPA.

Interfraternity Council

OrganizationChapterPhilanthropy Beta Theta Pi Eta Omega Beta Theta Pi Foundation Delta Sigma Phi Epsilon Kappa American Red Cross Sigma Chi Lambda Nu Huntsman Cancer Institute Tau Kappa Epsilon Epsilon Kappa St. Jude Children's Research Hospital Pi Kappa Phi Kappa Phi The Ability Experience

Theta Alpha Phi Alpha Education Foundation, Inc. Alpha Psi Lambda National Inc. Xi Boys & Girls Club of America Delta Phi Lambda Sorority Inc. Kappa Osteoporosis Awareness & Prevention Delta Sigma Theta Sorority Inc. Lambda Delta Research and Education Foundation, Mental Health Across Lifespan Lambda Phi Epsilon Fraternity Inc. Associate Chapter National Marrow Donor Program Lambda Theta Alpha Latin Sorority Inc. Delta Nu St. Jude's Children Research Hospital Zeta Phi Beta Sorority Inc. Mu Phi Elder Care Initiative, National Education Foundation, St. Jude's Children's Research Hospital, Stork's Nest (March of Dimes)
